General.Name: Chumporn Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited
General.Description: Chumporn Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes palm oil products in Thailand. It also provides palm seeds and sprouts, palm seedling products, dolomite, palm fertilizer, kernel meal, and Trichoderma CPI plus; and crude palm oil and crude palm kernel oil, refined bleached deodorized (RBD) palm oil, palm olein, and palm kernel fatty acid distillate; and palm stearin and palm fatty acid distillate. The company offers oils in bottles, tins, and pouches under the LEELA brand, as well as acts as an original equipment manufacturer. In addition, it produces and distributes biodiesel, and electricity from biogas. The company also exports its products. Chumporn Palm Oil Industry Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Tha Sae, Thailand.
General.Address: 296, Moo 2, Phet Kasem Road, Tha Sae, Thailand, 86140
